argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ismred.ss | |- ( ph -> C C_ ~P X ) |
| 2 |  | ismred.ba | |- ( ph -> X e. C ) |
| 3 |  | ismred.in | |- ( ( ph /\ s C_ C /\ s =/= (/) ) -> |^| s e. C ) |
| 4 |  | #P_selpw | |- ( s e. ~P C <-> s C_ C ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_3expia | |- ( ( ph /\ s C_ C ) -> ( s =/= (/) -> |^| s e. C ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( ph /\ s e. ~P C ) -> ( s =/= (/) -> |^| s e. C ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. s e. ~P C ( s =/= (/) -> |^| s e. C ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ismre | |- ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) <-> ( C C_ ~P X /\ X e. C /\ A. s e. ~P C ( s =/= (/) -> |^| s e. C ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 7, 8 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( ph -> C e. ( Moore ` X ) ) |
